thread.title: Jamie Lynn Spears' Daughter Maddie Is In Critical But Stable Condition
thread.title_full: Jamie Lynn Spears' Daughter Maddie Is In Critical But Stable Condition

author: Perez Hilton
title: Jamie Lynn Spears' Daughter Maddie Is In Critical But Stable Condition
text:
2/06/2017 12:55 PM ET | Filed under: Sad Sad • Jamie Lynn Spears • Scary! 
According to reports , Jamie Lynn Spears ' daughter Maddie Aldridge is now in critical but stable condition following her ATV injury on Sunday. 
Related: Jamie Lynn's Dad Asks For Prayers For Maddie 
Being in critical but stable condition means her condition is not deteriorating but that she is still very ill. 
Maddie got hurt after a Polaris off-road vehicle flipped over. She was reportedly submerged in a lake for several minutes and was unconscious when taken to a local hospital. 
She was later airlifted to a hospital in New Orleans. 
We continue to pray so hard for her full recovery.
